articles.author: Rakesh Patil
articles.title: Taking Stock: Market gains 1% amid intraday recovery; mid, smallcap shine - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Top gainers on the Nifty were Hindalco Industries, Dr Reddy's Laboratories, Tata Steel, Power Grid Corporation and HCL Technologies, while losers included ICICI Bank, Axis Bank, Asian Paints, Adani Ports and HDFC Life.
articles.content:
Indian benchmark indices broke two-day losing streak and erased some of the losses of previous sessions to end higher in volatile trading on January 24, amid buying across the sectors.
